mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.devicename, d.datatablename, d.id_site, d.is_excluded_meter, d.reverse_poa, dt.id AS id_device_type, t.value AS timezone_value FROM device d LEFT JOIN device_type dt ON d.id_device_type = dt.id LEFT JOIN site s ON s.id = d.id_site LEFT JOIN time_zone t ON t.id = s.id_time_zone WHERE d.id_site = #{id_site} AND d.`status` = 1 AND d.is_delete = 0 AND (CONVERT_TZ(NOW(), 'UTC', t.value) < s.expiration OR s.expiration IS NULL) AND (d.meter_type = 3 OR d.meter_type IS NULL)
SELECT date_from, date_to FROM hidden_data WHERE id_device = #{id} AND status = 1 AND is_delete = 0

SELECT hd.id_device, hd.date_from, hd.date_to FROM hidden_data hd LEFT JOIN device d ON d.id = hd.id_device LEFT JOIN site s ON s.id = d.id_site WHERE s.id = #{id_site} AND s.status = 1 AND s.is_delete = 0 AND d.status = 1 AND d.is_delete = 0 AND hd.status = 1 AND hd.is_delete = 0

choose.when: FROM_UNIXTIME(((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(${time}) DIV 60)*60), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS group_by_time, FROM_UNIXTIME(((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(${time}) DIV 60)*60), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS time_full, FROM_UNIXTIME(((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(${time}) DIV 60)*60), ) AS categories_time,

FROM_UNIXTIME(((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(${time}) DIV 300)*300), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS group_by_time, FROM_UNIXTIME(((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(${time}) DIV 300)*300), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS time_full, FROM_UNIXTIME(((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(${time}) DIV 300)*300), ) AS categories_time,

FROM_UNIXTIME(((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(${time}) DIV 900)*900), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS group_by_time, FROM_UNIXTIME(((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(${time}) DIV 900)*900), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS time_full, FROM_UNIXTIME(((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(${time}) DIV 900)*900), ) AS categories_time,
DATE_FORMAT( ${time}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00' ) AS group_by_time, DATE_FORMAT( ${time}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00' ) AS time_full, DATE_FORMAT( ${time}, ) AS categories_time,
DATE_FORMAT( ${time}, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS group_by_time, DATE_FORMAT( ${time}, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS time_full, DATE_FORMAT( ${time}, ) AS categories_time,

DATE_FORMAT( ${time}, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS group_by_time, DATE_FORMAT( DATE_SUB(${time}, INTERVAL (MOD(DATEDIFF(${time}, #{start_date}), 7 )) DAY), '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS time_full, DATE_FORMAT( ${time}, ) AS categories_time,
DATE_FORMAT( ${time}, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS group_by_time, DATE_FORMAT( ${time}, '%m/%Y' ) AS time_full, DATE_FORMAT( ${time}, '%b. %Y' ) AS categories_time,
DATE_FORMAT( ${time}, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS group_by_time, DATE_FORMAT( ${time}, '%Y' ) AS time_full, DATE_FORMAT( ${time}, '%Y' ) AS categories_time,
choose.otherwise: DATE_FORMAT( ${time}, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS group_by_time, "all" AS time_full, "all" AS categories_time,

mapper.sql:
TRIM(
'${time_format}'
'%d. %b'
'%d. %b ${time_format}'
CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(#{end_date}, #{start_date}) < 45 THEN '%m/%d' ELSE '%b. %Y' END
)
mapper.select:
SELECT t.categories_time, t.time_full, ROUND(( SUM( t.`value` ) ), 1 ) AS chart_energy_kwh, t.id FROM (
SELECT d.id,
CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(#{end_date}, #{start_date}) < 5 THEN AVG(IF( (dpf.min_value IS NOT NULL AND dv.nvmActivePower < dpf.min_value) OR (dpf.max_value IS NOT NULL AND dv.nvmActivePower > dpf.max_value), NULL, dv.nvmActivePower )) ELSE SUM(IF( (dpf.min_value IS NOT NULL AND dv.MeasuredProduction < dpf.min_value) OR (dpf.max_value IS NOT NULL AND dv.MeasuredProduction > dpf.max_value), 0, dv.MeasuredProduction )) END AS `value` FROM ${item.datatablename} dv LEFT JOIN device d ON d.id = dv.id_device LEFT JOIN site s ON s.id = d.id_site LEFT JOIN time_zone t ON t.id = s.id_time_zone LEFT JOIN device_parameters dp ON dp.id_device_group = d.id_device_group AND dp.is_user_defined = 1 AND dp.is_energy = 1 AND ${filterEnabled} = true LEFT JOIN device_parameter_filter dpf ON dp.id = dpf.id_device_parameter AND d.id = dpf.id_device AND (dpf.min_value IS NOT NULL OR dpf.max_value IS NOT NULL) WHERE s.id = #{item.id_site} AND d.id = #{item.id} AND (CONVERT_TZ( dv.time, 'UTC', t.value ) BETWEEN #{start_date} AND #{end_date})
AND CASE WHEN d.id = #{hidden.id_device} THEN CONVERT_TZ( dv.time, 'UTC', t.value ) NOT BETWEEN #{hidden.date_from} AND #{hidden.date_to} ELSE TRUE END
AND s.`status` = 1 AND d.`status` = 1 GROUP BY d.id, time_full
) t GROUP BY
t.id,
t.time_full

SELECT id, time_full, categories_time,
CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(#{end_date}, #{start_date}) < 5 THEN ROUND(SUM(meterPower), 1) ELSE CAST(SUM(meterEnergy) AS DECIMAL) END AS chart_energy_kwh
CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(#{end_date}, #{start_date}) < 5 THEN IF(#{totalMeter} > 0, ROUND(SUM(meterPower), 1), ROUND(SUM(inverterPower), 1)) ELSE IF(#{totalMeter} > 0, CAST(SUM(meterEnergy) AS DECIMAL), CAST(SUM(inverterEnergy) AS DECIMAL)) END AS chart_energy_kwh, IF(#{totalMeter} > 0, ROUND(SUM(meterPower), 1), ROUND(SUM(inverterPower), 1)) AS nvmActivePower, IF(#{totalMeter} > 0, CAST(SUM(meterEnergy) AS DECIMAL), CAST(SUM(inverterEnergy) AS DECIMAL)) AS nvmActiveEnergy
FROM ( SELECT d.id, d.id_device_type,
AVG(IF( (dpf1.min_value IS NOT NULL AND sdr.PowerTodayAVG < dpf1.min_value) OR (dpf1.max_value IS NOT NULL AND sdr.PowerTodayAVG > dpf1.max_value), NULL, IF(d.id_device_type IN (3,7,9) AND d.is_excluded_meter = 0, sdr.PowerTodayAVG, NULL) )) AS meterPower, AVG(IF( (dpf1.min_value IS NOT NULL AND sdr.PowerTodayAVG < dpf1.min_value) OR (dpf1.max_value IS NOT NULL AND sdr.PowerTodayAVG > dpf1.max_value), NULL, IF(d.id_device_type = 1, sdr.PowerTodayAVG, NULL) )) AS inverterPower, SUM(IF( (dpf2.min_value IS NOT NULL AND sdr.ActualGeneration < dpf2.min_value) OR (dpf2.max_value IS NOT NULL AND sdr.ActualGeneration > dpf2.max_value), 0, IF(d.id_device_type IN (3,7,9) AND d.is_excluded_meter = 0, sdr.ActualGeneration, 0) )) AS meterEnergy, SUM(IF( (dpf2.min_value IS NOT NULL AND sdr.ActualGeneration < dpf2.min_value) OR (dpf2.max_value IS NOT NULL AND sdr.ActualGeneration > dpf2.max_value), 0, IF(d.id_device_type = 1, sdr.ActualGeneration, 0) )) AS inverterEnergy FROM ${table_data_report} sdr LEFT JOIN device d ON d.id = sdr.id_device LEFT JOIN site s ON s.id = d.id_site LEFT JOIN device_parameters dp1 ON dp1.id_device_group = d.id_device_group AND dp1.is_active_power = 1 AND ${filterEnabled} = true LEFT JOIN device_parameter_filter dpf1 ON dp1.id = dpf1.id_device_parameter AND d.id = dpf1.id_device AND (dpf1.min_value IS NOT NULL OR dpf1.max_value IS NOT NULL) LEFT JOIN device_parameters dp2 ON dp2.id_device_group = d.id_device_group AND dp2.is_user_defined = 1 AND dp2.is_energy = 1 AND ${filterEnabled} = true LEFT JOIN device_parameter_filter dpf2 ON dp2.id = dpf2.id_device_parameter AND d.id = dpf2.id_device AND (dpf2.min_value IS NOT NULL OR dpf2.max_value IS NOT NULL) WHERE s.`status` = 1 AND d.`status` = 1 AND d.id_site = #{id_site} AND s.is_delete = 0 AND d.is_delete = 0 AND (d.meter_type = 3 OR d.meter_type IS NULL) AND sdr.time BETWEEN #{start_date} AND #{end_date}
AND CASE WHEN d.id = #{item.id_device} THEN sdr.time NOT BETWEEN #{item.date_from} AND #{item.date_to} ELSE TRUE END
GROUP BY d.id, time_full ) mt GROUP BY
id,
time_full

SELECT time_full, categories_time, ROUND(nvm_irradiance, 1) AS nvm_irradiance, CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(#{end_date}, #{start_date}) < 5 THEN ROUND(nvmActivePower, 1) ELSE CAST(nvmActiveEnergy AS DECIMAL) END AS chart_energy_kwh, ROUND(nvmActivePower, 1) AS nvmActivePower, CAST(nvmActiveEnergy AS DECIMAL) AS nvmActiveEnergy, ROUND(expected_power, 1) AS expected_power, ROUND(expected_energy, 1) AS expected_energy FROM ( SELECT time_full, categories_time, AVG(nvmActivePower) AS nvmActivePower, SUM(nvmActiveEnergy) AS nvmActiveEnergy, AVG(nvm_irradiance) AS nvm_irradiance, AVG(expected_power) AS expected_power,
AVG(expected_power) / 60 AS expected_energy
AVG(expected_power) / 12 AS expected_energy
AVG(expected_power) / 4 AS expected_energy
AVG(expected_power) AS expected_energy
AVG(expected_power) * 24 * COUNT(*) AS expected_energy
FROM ( SELECT
AVG(IF( (dpf1.min_value IS NOT NULL AND dv.nvmActivePower < dpf1.min_value) OR (dpf1.max_value IS NOT NULL AND dv.nvmActivePower > dpf1.max_value), NULL, dv.nvmActivePower )) AS nvmActivePower, SUM(IF( (dpf2.min_value IS NOT NULL AND dv.nvmActiveEnergy < dpf2.min_value) OR (dpf2.max_value IS NOT NULL AND dv.nvmActiveEnergy > dpf2.max_value), 0, dv.nvmActiveEnergy )) AS nvmActiveEnergy, AVG(dv.nvm_irradiance) AS nvm_irradiance, AVG(dv.expected_power_ac) AS expected_power FROM ${datatablename} dv LEFT JOIN device d ON d.id = dv.id_device LEFT JOIN site s ON s.id = d.id_site LEFT JOIN time_zone t ON t.id = s.id_time_zone LEFT JOIN device_parameters dp1 ON dp1.id_device_group = d.id_device_group AND dp1.is_active_power = 1 AND ${filterEnabled} = true LEFT JOIN device_parameter_filter dpf1 ON dp1.id = dpf1.id_device_parameter AND d.id = dpf1.id_device AND (dpf1.min_value IS NOT NULL OR dpf1.max_value IS NOT NULL) LEFT JOIN device_parameters dp2 ON dp2.id_device_group = d.id_device_group AND dp2.is_user_defined = 1 AND dp2.is_energy = 1 AND ${filterEnabled} = true LEFT JOIN device_parameter_filter dpf2 ON dp2.id = dpf2.id_device_parameter AND d.id = dpf2.id_device AND (dpf2.min_value IS NOT NULL OR dpf2.max_value IS NOT NULL) WHERE s.`status` = 1 AND d.`status` = 1 AND d.id_site = #{id_site} AND d.id_device_type = 12 AND s.is_delete = 0 AND d.is_delete = 0 AND (d.meter_type = 3 OR d.meter_type IS NULL) AND (CONVERT_TZ( dv.time, 'UTC', t.value ) BETWEEN #{start_date} AND #{end_date})
AND CASE WHEN d.id = #{item.id_device} THEN CONVERT_TZ( dv.time, 'UTC', t.value ) NOT BETWEEN #{item.date_from} AND #{item.date_to} ELSE TRUE END
GROUP BY group_by_time ) t GROUP BY time_full ) t

SELECT t.categories_time, ROUND( AVG(t.nvm_irradiance), 1 ) AS nvm_irradiance, ROUND( AVG(t.expected_power), 1 ) AS expected_power,
ROUND( AVG(t.expected_power) / 60, 1 ) AS expected_energy,
ROUND( AVG(t.expected_power) * 12, 1 ) AS expected_energy,
ROUND( AVG(t.expected_power) / 4 , 1 ) AS expected_energy,
ROUND( AVG(t.expected_power) , 1 ) AS expected_energy,
ROUND( AVG(t.expected_power) * 24 * COUNT(*), 1 ) AS expected_energy,
t.time_full FROM ( SELECT
AVG(
) AS expected_power, AVG(dv.nvm_irradiance) AS nvm_irradiance FROM ${datatablename} dv LEFT JOIN device d ON d.id = dv.id_device LEFT JOIN site s ON s.id = d.id_site LEFT JOIN time_zone t ON t.id = s.id_time_zone WHERE s.id = #{id_site} AND (CONVERT_TZ( dv.time, 'UTC', t.value ) BETWEEN #{start_date} AND #{end_date})
AND CASE WHEN d.id = #{hidden.id_device} THEN CONVERT_TZ( dv.time, 'UTC', t.value ) NOT BETWEEN #{hidden.date_from} AND #{hidden.date_to} ELSE TRUE END
AND s.`status` = 1 AND d.`status` = 1 AND d.id = #{id_device} GROUP BY group_by_time ) t GROUP BY t.time_full

SELECT s.id, s.kiosk_view, SHA1(s.id) AS hash_id, scm.id_employee, AS `name`, s.dc_capacity, s.ac_capacity, s.lat, s.lng, s.data_send_time, t.`offset`, IFNULL(e.energy_today, 0) AS energy_today, IFNULL(e.peak_power_today, 0) AS peak_power_today, IF(e.energy_lifetime, FORMAT(ROUND(e.energy_lifetime * 0.0117, 0), 0) , 0) AS total_tree, IF(e.energy_lifetime, FORMAT(ROUND((e.energy_lifetime * 392), 0), 0) , 0) AS total_co2, IFNULL(e.energy_lifetime, 0) AS energy_lifetime, CASE WHEN s.unit_type_temp = 1 THEN IF(s.weather_indoor_temp_unit = '째C', s.weather_indoor_temp, ROUND(s.weather_indoor_temp * 1.8 + 32,1) ) WHEN s.unit_type_temp = 2 THEN IF(s.weather_indoor_temp_unit = '째C', ROUND(s.weather_indoor_temp * 1.8 + 32,1), ROUND((s.weather_indoor_temp) - 32 * 5/9,1)) ELSE "-" END AS temperature,
CASE WHEN s.unit_type_temp = 1 THEN "째C" WHEN s.unit_type_temp = 2 THEN "째F" ELSE "N/A" END AS temperature_unit,
s.weather_humidity AS humidity
FROM site s LEFT JOIN site_employee_map scm ON scm.id_site = s.id LEFT JOIN time_zone t ON t.id = s.id_time_zone LEFT JOIN country c ON c.id = s.id_country LEFT JOIN( SELECT d.id_site, ROUND(SUM(d.energy_today), 1) AS energy_today, ROUND(SUM(d.last_value), 2) AS peak_power_today, ROUND(SUM(d.energy_lifetime), 0) AS energy_lifetime FROM device d LEFT JOIN site s ON s.id = d.id_site WHERE s.id = #{id_site} AND s.`status` = 1 AND s.is_delete = 0 AND d.`status` = 1
AND d.id_device_type IN (3,7,9) AND d.is_excluded_meter = 0
AND d.id_device_type IN (1)
GROUP BY d.id_site ) e ON e.id_site = s.id
WHERE s.id = #{id_site} AND s.`status` = 1 AND s.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY s.id;

SELECT ( SELECT COUNT( e.id_error_level ) AS lowPriority FROM alert a LEFT JOIN error e ON a.id_error = e.id LEFT JOIN device d ON d.id = a.id_device LEFT JOIN site s ON s.id = d.id_site LEFT JOIN site_employee_map scm ON s.id = scm.id_site WHERE e.id_error_level = 13 AND a.`status` = 1 AND e.`status` = 1 AND s.status = 1 AND s.is_delete = 0 AND scm.id_employee = #{id_customer} AND scm.is_hiding = 0 GROUP BY e.id_error_level ) AS lowPriority,
( SELECT COUNT( e.id_error_level ) AS highPriority FROM alert a LEFT JOIN error e ON a.id_error = e.id LEFT JOIN device d ON d.id = a.id_device LEFT JOIN site s ON s.id = d.id_site LEFT JOIN site_employee_map scm ON s.id = scm.id_site WHERE e.id_error_level = 11 AND a.`status` = 1 AND e.`status` = 1 AND s.status = 1 AND s.is_delete = 0 AND scm.id_employee = #{id_customer} AND scm.is_hiding = 0 GROUP BY e.id_error_level ) AS highPriority,
( SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalError FROM alert a LEFT JOIN error e ON a.id_error = e.id LEFT JOIN device d ON d.id = a.id_device LEFT JOIN site s ON s.id = d.id_site LEFT JOIN site_employee_map scm ON s.id = scm.id_site WHERE a.`status` = 1 AND e.`status` = 1 AND s.status = 1 AND s.is_delete = 0 AND scm.id_employee = #{id_customer} AND scm.is_hiding = 0
AND e.id_error_level != 14
) AS totalError
